description: Keep little feet protected and warm with these slip-on reef booties. The 1mm thick neoprene helps protect from rocks and sharp bits and cold water. Perfect for pools and tropical waters of 18˚C and warmer.1mm neoprene provides protection and comfort.Pull-on style with rear loop for easy on and off.Textured rubber sole is durable and grippy.
name: Xcel Reef Walker 1mm Neoprene Boots - Children
